title: DeliveryAmountElectionEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the application of Interest Amount with respect to the Delivery Amount through standard language.

oneOf.title: LastAndAnyLocalBusinessDay
oneOf.description: The delivery includes both `Transfer on last Local Business Day` and `Transfer a Delivery Amount (IM) consisting of cash on any Local Business Day.`

oneOf.title: LastLocalBusinessDay
oneOf.description: The delivery only includes `Transfer on last Local Business Day.
